finnish: Luulen, että se kirja löytyy kirjastosta.
english: I believe that book is in the library.

spanish: ¿De verdad quieres una taza de café tan tarde por la noche?
finnish: Haluatko todella kupin kahvia näin myöhään illalla?
english: Do you really want a cup of coffee this late at night?

spanish: Por lo general, mis amigos me llaman Freddy.
english: My friends generally call me Freddy.

spanish: Encontré un regalo bajo mi almohada.
english: I found a gift underneath my pillow.

spanish: Tu libro cambió mi vida.
english: Your book has changed my life.

spanish: Me apesta el cine mudo.
english: I hate silent movies.

spanish: Me gustaría estudiar química en la universidad.
english: I'd like to study chemistry at college.

spanish: ¿Cuánta gente hay en tu fiesta?
english: How many people are at your party?

spanish: Dicen que la casa de veraneo de Liisa se incendió.
english: They say that Liisa's summer house burned down.

spanish: Muchos traicionaron a sus amigos por dinero.
english: Many betrayed their friends for money.

spanish: Debido a la televisión, niños y niñas no quieren leer libros.
finnish: Television vuoksi pojat ja tytöt eivät halua lukea kirjoja.
english: Because of TV, boys and girls don't want to read books.

spanish: Tom y María solían ser amigos.
finnish: Tom ja Mary tapasivat olla ystäviä.
english: Tom and Mary used to be friends.

spanish: ¿Cuándo partió tu amigo a América?
english: When did your friend leave for America?

spanish: No puedo comprarte ese vestido.
finnish: En voi ostaa sinulle tuota mekkoa.
english: I can't buy you that dress.

spanish: Hay una película que quiero ver por TV mañana en la noche.
finnish: Televisiosta tulee huomenillalla elokuva, jonka tahdon katsoa.
english: There's a movie I want to watch on TV tomorrow night.

spanish: Quiero ver esto por mí mismo.
english: I want to see this myself.

spanish: Tom no podrá convertirse en policía.
english: Tom won't be able to become a policeman.

spanish: Espero que pueda ayudarte en otra ocasión.
finnish: Toivon että pystyn auttamaan sinua joskus toiste.
english: I hope that I will be able to help you at some other time.

spanish: Si voy a la fiesta llevaré algunas botellas de vino.
finnish: Jos menen juhliin, otan muutaman pullon viiniä.
english: If I go to the party, I'll take some bottles of wine.

spanish: Voy a devolver este suéter porque es demasiado grande.
finnish: Tulen palauttamaan tämän neulepuseron, koska se on liian iso.
english: I am going to return this sweater because it's too big.

spanish: Ellos escucharon un discurso escrito especialmente para ellos.
finnish: He kuulivat puheen, joka oli erityisesti kirjoitettu heitä varten.
english: They heard a speech written especially for them.

spanish: Todo está listo para la fiesta ahora.
finnish: Kaikki on nyt valmiina juhlaa varten.
english: Everything is ready now for the party.

spanish: Me enviaron a darte esto.
finnish: Minut on lähetetty antamaan sinulle tämä.
english: I've been sent to give you this.

spanish: Me hace enfadar que mis amigos no estén aquí.
finnish: Minua harmittaa, etteivät ystäväni ole täällä.
english: It annoys me that my friends aren't here.

spanish: Estoy en medio de algo. ¿Podrías volver más tarde?
finnish: Olen kesken tekemisen. Voisitko tulla takaisin myöhemmin?
english: I'm in the middle of something. Could you come back later?

spanish: La muerte del actor estuvo en los encabezados de todas las revistas.
finnish: Näyttelijän kuolema oli jokaisen lehden otsikoissa.
english: The actor's death was in the headlines of every magazine.

spanish: Me hice amigo de una estudiante extranjera.
english: I made friends with a student from abroad.

spanish: Las clases de alemán se imparten dos veces a la semana; lunes y miércoles.
finnish: Saksantunnit pidetään kahdesti viikossa - maanantaisin ja keskiviikkoisin.
english: German classes are held twice a week - on Mondays and Wednesdays.

spanish: Esta lista no esta en orden alfabético y por eso es difícil de leer.
finnish: Tämä lista ei ole aakkosjärjestyksessä ja sitä on siksi vaikea lukea.
english: This list isn't in alphabetical order and because of that it's difficult to read.

spanish: Iré afuera a ver los fuegos artificiales.
english: I'll go out and see the fireworks.

spanish: Ella se veía triste al leer la carta.
finnish: Hän näytti surulliselta kun hän luki kirjeen.
english: When she was reading the letter, she looked sad.

spanish: Linda fue al parque a escuchar música.
english: Linda went to the park to listen to music.

spanish: Este libro no es de Tom.
english: This book doesn't belong to Tom.

spanish: Es ilegal copiar libros sin permiso del autor.
finnish: On laitonta kopioida kirjoista ilman kirjailijan lupaa.
english: It is illegal to copy from books without the author's permission.

spanish: Puedes comprarlo en cualquier venta de libros.
finnish: Voit ostaa sen mistä tahansa kirjakaupasta.
english: You can buy it at any bookstore.

spanish: La película fue mucho mejor de lo que se esperaba.
finnish: Se elokuva oli paljon odotettua parempi.
english: The film was much better than expected.

spanish: Las bibliotecas ofrecen varios otros servicios aparte de prestar libros.
finnish: Paitsi kirjojen lainausta kirjastot tarjoavat lukuisia muita palveluita.
english: Besides lending books, libraries offer various other services.

spanish: ¿Por qué él no vino a la fiesta?
english: Why didn't he come to the party?

spanish: Tom está aprendiendo a bailar tango.
english: Tom is learning to dance the tango.

spanish: Tom no tiene ganas de llevar a su perro a caminar esta mañana.
finnish: Tomia ei huvita viedä koiraansa kävelylle tänä aamuna.
english: Tom doesn't feel like taking a walk with his dog this morning.

spanish: Avísame cuando averigües qué es.
finnish: Anna minun tietää, kun keksit mikä se on.
english: Let me know when you find out what it is.

spanish: Si estás aburrido, sugiero que vayas al cine.
finnish: Jos sinulla on tylsää, ehdotan, että menet elokuviin.
english: If you're bored, I suggest you go to the cinema.

spanish: Últimamente no he tenido nada de tiempo para leer libros.
finnish: Viime aikoina minulla ei ole ollut lainkaan aikaa lukea kirjoja.
english: I haven't had any time to read books lately.

spanish: ¿Por qué es necesario resolver conflictos?
english: Why is it necessary to resolve conflicts?

spanish: En la playa puedes pasar tiempo con tus amigos.
finnish: Rannalla voi viettää aikaa kavereiden kanssa.
english: On the beach you can spend time with your friends.

spanish: Me dio mucho sueño después de leer un poco.
finnish: Tulin hyvin uneliaaksi pienen lukemisen jälkeen.
english: I became very sleepy after a bit of reading.

spanish: No dejes que los niños vean esta película.
finnish: Älä anna lasten katsoa tätä filmiä.
english: Don't let the kids watch this film.

spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo piensas quedarte aquí en Brasil?
finnish: Kuinka kauaksi aiot jäädä tänne Brasiliaan?
english: How long do you intend to stay here in Brazil?

spanish: Él quiere jugar fútbol esta tarde.
finnish: Hän haluaa pelata jalkapalloa tänä iltapäivänä.
english: He wants to play soccer this afternoon.

spanish: Kuwait sufrió daños severos.
english: Kuwait suffered severe damage.

spanish: Le quiero dar un regalo de cumpleaños.
english: I want to give him a present for his birthday.

spanish: Hay algo de verdad en eso.
english: There is some truth in that.

spanish: No puedo darte una respuesta inmediata.
finnish: En voi antaa sinulle välitöntä vastausta.
english: I can not give you an immediate answer.

spanish: Te ves verdaderamente bien.
english: You look really good.

spanish: Voy a matarte por desperdiciar mi tiempo.
english: I'm going to kill you for wasting my time.

spanish: Lo importante es tener tu propio pasatiempo.
english: The important thing is to have your own hobby.

spanish: Lo importante no es ganar el juego, sino participar.
finnish: Tärkeätä ei ole voittaa peli vaan ottaa osaa siihen.
english: The important thing is not to win the game, but to take part in it.

spanish: Es horrible verlo.
english: It is horrible to see.

spanish: Cuando la lluvia amaine, iremos a caminar.
english: When the rain stops, we'll go for a walk.

spanish: Averigüé dónde estaba ella.
english: I found out where she was.

spanish: Por favor, cuéntanos por qué necesitas quedarte aquí.
finnish: Ole hyvä ja kerro miksi sinun tarvitsee jäädä tänne.
english: Please tell us why you need to stay here.

spanish: Tom esperaba que María no descubriera la verdad.
finnish: Tom toivoi että Mary ei saisi totuutta selville.
english: Tom was hoping Mary wouldn't find out the truth.

spanish: Solo escuchar esa canción me hace pensar en ti.
finnish: Jo tuon laulun kuunteleminen saa minut ajattelemaan sinua.
english: Just listening to that song makes me think of you.

spanish: Un cuarteto de cuerdas está ensayando en el cuarto contiguo.
english: A string quartet is rehearsing in the next room.

spanish: Es difícil distinguir una verdad de una mentira.
english: It is hard to distinguish truth from a lie.

spanish: ¿Cuáles son tus pasatiempos?
english: What are your hobbies?

spanish: ¿Nos cantarías una canción en francés?
english: Would you sing us a song in French?

spanish: No estás diciendo la verdad.
english: You're not telling the truth.

spanish: Yo pienso que deberías tomarte un descanso; te ves enferma.
finnish: Minusta sinun pitäisi levätä. Näytät sairaalta.
english: I think you'd better take a rest; you look ill.

spanish: ¿Pasaste un buen verano?
english: Did you have a good summer?

spanish: Yo también quiero jugar.
english: I also want to play.

spanish: ¿De verdad? A mí me tomó una hora en tren.
finnish: Todellako? Minulta se kesti tunnin junalla.
english: Really? It took me an hour by train.

spanish: No voy a ver a nadie más.
english: I'm not going to see anybody else.

spanish: ¡Ven a vernos!
english: Come to see us!

spanish: El libro fue publicado después de la muerte del autor.
english: The book was published after the author's death.

spanish: Quisiera verlo.
english: I'd like to see it.

spanish: Ven a tomarte un vaso de vino conmigo.
english: Come have a glass of wine with me.

spanish: No deberías leer con tan poca luz.
finnish: Sinun ei pitäisi lukea noin heikossa valossa.
english: You shouldn't read in such poor light.

spanish: Tom tiene problemas para expresar sus verdaderos sentimientos.
finnish: Tomilla on vaikeuksia ilmaista tosia tunteitaan.
english: Tom has trouble expressing his true feelings.

spanish: Si terminaste de leer el libro, devuélvelo a la biblioteca.
finnish: Jos olet lukenut kirjan loppuun, palauta se kirjastoon.
english: If you have finished reading the book, return it to the library.

spanish: Su libro es rojo.
english: His book is red.

spanish: El grupo trataba de resolver problemas sociales.
english: The group tried to solve social problems.

spanish: Le doy un ramo de flores a mi amiga.
english: I give my friend a bunch of flowers.

spanish: Paró de llover.
english: The rain stopped.

spanish: ¡Para de quejarte!
english: Quit complaining.

spanish: Él tradujo el libro del francés al inglés.
english: He translated the book from French into English.

spanish: Reparte las cartas, por favor.
english: Please deal the cards.

spanish: Solo trato de ahorrarte tiempo.
english: I'm only trying to save you time.

spanish: Solo estoy interesado en la verdad.
english: I'm only interested in the truth.

spanish: No estoy segura de que pueda ayudarte.
finnish: En ole varma että voin auttaa sinua.
english: I'm not sure that I can help you.

spanish: Acabo de ver a María en el parque.
english: I've just seen Marie at the park.

spanish: Mi amor por ti no me deja contarte todo. Es mejor no contar algunas cosas.
finnish: Rakkauteni sinuun ei anna minun kertoa sinulle kaikkea. Jotkin asiat on parempi jättää sanomatta.
english: My love for you won't let me tell you everything. Some things are better left unsaid.

spanish: A mi hermano le interesa aquello que llaman música pop.
finnish: Veljeni on kiinnostunut siitä, mitä sanotaan popmusiikiksi.
english: My brother likes what they call pop music.

spanish: Pedí algunos libros desde Londres.
english: I ordered some books from London.

spanish: No podría matarte, Tom.
english: I couldn't kill you, Tom.

spanish: Él se sabe muchos trucos de magia divertidos.
english: He knows many amusing magic tricks.

spanish: Él tiene buen ojo para el arte.
english: He has a good eye for art.

spanish: No tiene sentido tratar de resolver este problema.
finnish: Ei ole mitään mieltä yrittää ratkaista tätä ongelmaa.
english: It is no use trying to solve this problem.

spanish: Sé la verdadera razón por la que se ausenta.
english: I know the real reason for his absence.

spanish: Me gustó esa película.
english: I liked that movie.

spanish: El restaurante estaba bien vacío, así que pude leer en paz mientras comía.
finnish: Ravintola oli melko tyhjä, joten sain lukea rauhassa samalla kun söin.
english: The restaurant was fairly empty, so I could read in peace while I ate.

spanish: Este libro es para mí lo que la Biblia es para ti.
finnish: Tämä kirja on minulle sitä, mitä Raamattu on sinulle.
english: This book is to me what the Bible is to you.

spanish: Este problema es un verdadero desafío.
english: This problem is a real challenge.

spanish: Quisiera ver los árboles de donde agarraste estas manzanas.
finnish: Haluaisin nähdä puut, joista poimit nämä omenat.
english: I would like to see the trees from which you picked these apples.

spanish: La matemática es la lengua del universo.
english: Mathematics is the language of the universe.

spanish: A Tom le gustó mucho la película.
english: Tom liked the film a lot.

spanish: ¿Qué tiene eso que ver con Tom?
english: What does that have to do with Tom?

spanish: Estos son los primeros tomates cultivados en mi jardín.
finnish: Tässä ovat ensimmäiset omassa puutarhassani kasvaneet tomaatit.
english: These are the first tomatoes from my garden.

spanish: ¿Puedes asegurarte de que Tom aparezca a tiempo?
finnish: Voitko varmistaa, että Tom ilmestyy paikalle ajoissa?
english: Could you make sure Tom shows up on time?

spanish: Perdón por arruinar tu fiesta de cumpleaños.
english: I'm sorry for ruining your birthday party.

spanish: Quisiera ir a ver una película.
english: I'd like to go see a movie.

spanish: Al principio no me gustó, pero de poco a poco se volvió divertido.
finnish: Ensiksi en pitänyt siitä, mutta vähitellen se muuttui hauskaksi.
english: At first, I didn't like it, but it gradually became fun.

spanish: Quiero que seas mi amiga de nuevo.
english: I want you to be my friend again.

spanish: Muchos astrónomos asumen que el universo se expande infinitamente.
finnish: Monet astronomit olettavat avaruuden laajenevan rajattomasti.
english: Many astronomers assume that the universe expands infinitely.

spanish: Me recuerdas tanto a mi amiga Marina, una gran profesora de ruso.
finnish: Tuot mieleeni niin paljon ystäväni Marinan, loistavan venäjän opettajan.
english: You remind me so much of my friend Marina, a great teacher of Russian.

spanish: ¿Cuántos días nos quedan para que empiecen las vacaciones de verano?
finnish: Kuinka monta päivää meillä on jäljellä kunnes kesäloma alkaa?
english: How many days do we have left until summer vacation begins?

spanish: ¿Cuánto pesa una pelota de fútbol?
english: How much does a soccer ball weigh?

spanish: Rob, ve a ver televisión.
english: Rob, go watch TV.

spanish: Hoy estuvo divertida la escuela.
english: School was fun today.

spanish: Él jugará tenis mañana en la tarde.
english: He will be playing tennis tomorrow afternoon.

spanish: Tom dirá la verdad.
english: Tom will tell the truth.

spanish: Tom no estaba feliz de ver a María ahí.
finnish: Tom ei ilahtunut nähdessään Marin siellä.
english: Tom wasn't happy to see Mary there.

spanish: Tom era mi amigo más cercano.
english: Tom was my closest friend.

spanish: Solo pocas cosas nos traen tanto placer como la música.
finnish: Vain harvat asiat tuottavat meille yhtä paljon nautintoa kuin musiikki.
english: Few things bring as much pleasure as music.

spanish: No estás celoso, ¿verdad?
english: You're not jealous, are you?

spanish: Tom quiere matarte, Mary.
english: Tom wants to kill you, Mary.

spanish: Simplemente odio ver llorar a Tom.
finnish: Minä vain inhoa nähdä Tomin itkevän.
english: I just hate to see Tom cry.

spanish: Eres de Boston, ¿verdad?
finnish: Sinä olet kotoisin Bostonista, eikö niin?
english: You're from Boston, aren't you?

spanish: Nunca podría odiarte.
english: I could never hate you.

spanish: Tom trabajó como salvavidas durante el verano.
english: Tom worked as a lifeguard during the summer.

spanish: Tom pasó la mayor parte de su tiempo pescando.
finnish: Tom vietti suurimman osan ajastaan kalastaen.
english: Tom passed most of the time fishing.

spanish: Suena a que has conversado con Tom.
finnish: Kuulostaa siltä, että olet jutellut Tomin kanssa.
english: It sounds like you've been talking to Tom.

spanish: ¿Qué haría Tom si llegara a saber la verdad?
finnish: Mitä Tom tekisi, jos hän saisi tietää totuuden?
english: What would Tom do if he ever learned the truth?

spanish: Tom es introvertido y tímido.
english: Tom is introverted and shy.

spanish: Este libro habla sobre un rey que pierde su corona.
finnish: Tämä kirja kertoo kuninkaasta, joka menettää kruununsa.
english: This book is about a king who loses his crown.

spanish: El amor es lo que verdaderamente no quiero perder.
finnish: Rakkaus on se, mitä en todellakaan halua menettää.
english: Love is what I really don't want to lose.

spanish: ¿Por qué el gobierno quiere leer mi e-mail?
english: Why does the government want to read my emails?

spanish: Los americanos odian la música, pero adoran el entretenimiento.
finnish: Amerikkalaiset vihaavat musiikkia, mutta he rakastavat viihdettä.
english: Americans hate music, but love entertainment.

spanish: No pude dejarte solo.
english: I couldn't leave you alone.

spanish: Debemos mostrarte algo.
english: We need to show you something.

spanish: Sé que Tom es tu amigo, pero no me agrada mucho de todas formas.
finnish: Tiedän, että Tom on ystäväsi, mutta en silti pidä hänestä.
english: I know Tom is a friend of yours, but I still don't like him.

spanish: Averigüemos quién mató a Tom.
finnish: Otetaan selvää siitä kuka tappoi Tomin.
english: Let's find out who killed Tom.

spanish: Podría besarte justo ahora.
english: I could kiss you right now.

spanish: Podría ordenarte que te quedes.
english: I could order you to stay.

spanish: Quiero hablarte acerca de Tom.
english: I want to talk with you about Tom.

spanish: Tom quiere hablarte a las 2:30.
english: Tom wants to speak to you at 2:30.

spanish: ¿Por qué quieres que vaya a ver a Tom?
finnish: Miksi haluat, että menen tapaamaan Tomia.
english: Why do you want me to go see Tom?

spanish: ¿Puedes nombrar todos los árboles en el jardín?
english: Can you name all the trees in the garden?

spanish: Este libro no es tan pesado como aquel.
finnish: Tämä kirja ei ole niin painava kuin tuo.
english: This book isn't as heavy as that one.

spanish: Trata de asegurarte de que Tom no haga algo estúpido.
finnish: Yritä varmistaa, että Tom ei tee mitään typerää.
english: Try to make sure Tom doesn't do something stupid.

spanish: ¿Acaso tienes idea de lo estúpido que te hace ver esto?
finnish: Onko sinulla mitään käsitystä siitä kuinka typerältä tämä saa sinut näyttämään?
english: Do you have any idea how stupid this makes you look?

spanish: Todo este asunto es verdaderamente estúpido.
finnish: Tämä koko juttu on todella typerä.
english: This whole thing is really stupid.

spanish: Le deberíamos haber advertido a Tom del peligro.
finnish: Meidän olisi pitänyt varoittaa Tomia vaarasta.
english: We should've warned Tom of the danger.

spanish: Tom no tiene nada que ver con esto.
finnish: Tomilla ei ole mitään tekemistä tämän kanssa.
english: Tom has nothing to do with this.

spanish: Esto no tiene nada que ver con Tom.
finnish: Tällä ei ole mitään tekemistä Tomin kanssa.
english: This has nothing to do with Tom.

spanish: Solo porque a él le gusta pintar no significa que sea bueno para ello.
finnish: Vain koska hän pitää maalaamisesta, niin se ei tarkoita, että hän olisi hyvä siinä.
english: Just because he likes painting doesn't mean he's good at painting.

spanish: Mi padre durmió durante toda la película.
english: My father slept through the movie.

spanish: No pude ver un sola estrella en el cielo.
finnish: En kyennyt näkemään yhtään tähteä taivaalla.
english: I couldn't see any stars in the sky.

spanish: ¡Que comience el concierto!
english: Let the concert begin!

spanish: Lo he probado por algunos días y estoy bien seguro de que no te encantará.
finnish: Olen kokeillut sitä muutaman päivän ja olen melko varma ettet sitä rakasta.
english: I've tried it for a few days, and I'm pretty sure you won't love it.

spanish: Tu trabajo es asegurarte de que Tom haga bien su trabajo.
finnish: Sinun työsi on varmistaa, että Tom tekee työnsä oikein.
english: Your job is to make sure Tom does his job right.

spanish: Déjame ver qué tienes en la mano.
finnish: Anna minun nähdä mitä sinulla on kädessäsi.
english: Let me see what's in your hand.

spanish: Tom aún debe terminar de pintar la cerca.
finnish: Tomin on yhä maalattava aita loppuun.
english: Tom still has to finish painting the fence.

spanish: La princesa griega Alice era sorda y podía leer labios en tres idiomas.
finnish: Kreikan prinsessa Alice oli kuuro ja osasi lukea huulilta kolmea kieltä.
english: Princess Alice of Greece was deaf and could lip-read in three languages.

spanish: Mi papá gasta mucho tiempo en su pasatiempo.
english: My father spends a lot of time on his hobby.

spanish: Leí su libro.
english: I read his book.

spanish: Fue una película mala.
english: It was a bad movie.

spanish: Mi esposo y yo nos hemos apartado el uno de otro y ahora no sabemos cómo revertir el proceso.
finnish: Aviomieheni ja minä olemme ajautuneet toisistamme erilleen ja nyt emme tiedä miten saisimme kehityskulun käännettyä toiseen suuntaan.
english: My husband and I, we have drifted apart, and now we don't know how to reverse the process.

spanish: Sé leer.
english: I can read.

spanish: Tom puede bailar como un robot.
english: Tom can dance like a robot.

spanish: Tom cree que el universo de verdad tiene once dimensiones.
finnish: Tom uskoo, että maailmankaukkeudessa on oikeasti yksitoista ulottuvuutta.
english: Tom believes that the universe really has eleven dimensions.

spanish: Te diré la verdad ahora.
english: I'll tell you the truth now.

spanish: Debemos movernos muy rápido.
english: We have to move very quickly.

spanish: Tom casi nunca ve televisión.
english: Tom hardly ever watches TV.

spanish: Tom tuvo problemas para resolver la situación.
english: Tom had trouble resolving the situation.

spanish: A Tom le costaba hacer amigos.
english: Tom had trouble making friends.

spanish: Tengo una cuenta en esa tienda de libros.
english: I have an account at that book shop.

spanish: Te prestaré este libro.
english: I'll lend you this book.

spanish: Nadé mucho durante las vacaciones de verano.
english: I swam a lot during summer vacation.

spanish: Leed este libro.
english: Read this book.

spanish: ¿Os gusta nadar?
english: Do you like swimming?

spanish: Odio bailar.
english: I hate dancing.

spanish: Detesto bailar.
english: I hate dancing.

spanish: ¿Sabes por qué al arrollado primavera le dicen arrollado primavera?
english: Do you know why spring rolls are called spring rolls?

spanish: El número de muffins que recibirás será inversamente proporcional al número de veces que hables por IRC.
finnish: Saamiesi muffinien lukumäärä on käänteisesti verrannollinen siihen, miten usein juttelet IRCissä.
english: The number of muffins that you'll receive will be inversely proportional to the number of times you talk on IRC.

spanish: Tengo ganas de cantar en la lluvia.
english: I feel like singing in the rain.

spanish: ¿Es él tu amigo?
english: Is he your friend?

spanish: El fútbol es el deporte más popular en Brasil.
english: Soccer is the most popular sport in Brazil.

spanish: No me gusta nadar.
english: I don't like to swim.

spanish: Tom y sus amigos están jugando Dungeons & Dragons en el sótano.
finnish: Tom ja hänen ystävänsä pelaavat Dungeons & Dragonsia kellarissa.
english: Tom and his friends are playing Dungeons and Dragons in the basement.

spanish: Fui a la universidad por cuatro años y todo lo que obtuve fue este miserable diploma.
finnish: Kävin yliopistoa neljä vuotta ja kaikki, mitä sain, oli tämä surkea todistus.
english: I went to college for four years and all I got was this lousy diploma.

spanish: Un amigo mío está buscando a alguien que sepa hablar francés.
finnish: Eräs ystäväni etsii jotakuta, joka osaa puhua ranskaa.
english: A friend of mine is looking for someone who can speak French.

spanish: Le debes la verdad.
english: You owe her the truth.

spanish: Tiene pocas amigas.
english: She has few friends.

spanish: ¿Cuántos libros de aritmética quedan?
english: How many arithmetic books are left?

spanish: El fútbol es el deporte más popular del mundo.
english: Soccer is the world's most popular sport.

spanish: Tom tiene amigos en todo el mundo.
finnish: Tomilla on kavereita joka puolella maailmaa.
english: Tom has friends all over the world.

spanish: A Tom le gusta ver televisión.
english: Tom likes watching TV.

spanish: El protagonista de la nueva película es un ángel joven.
english: The protagonist of the new film is a child angel.

spanish: ¿A qué hora fue ayer el concierto?
english: What time yesterday was the concert?

spanish: ¿Qué pasó en el parque?
english: What happened in the park?

spanish: Esto será divertido.
english: This will be fun.

spanish: Tom fue al parque.
english: Tom went to the park.

spanish: Él juega bien al fútbol.
english: He is good at soccer.

spanish: Deberías escribir un libro.
english: You ought to write a book.

spanish: La verdad es que no sé nada al respecto.
finnish: Totuus on se, että en tiedä siitä yhtään mitään.
english: The truth is that I don't know anything about it.

spanish: ¿Es cosa tuya cuál sea el pasatiempo de una persona?
finnish: Onko se sinun asiasi mikä jonkun harrastus on?
english: Is it any of your business what someone's hobby is?

spanish: Mary no es mi novia. Es sólo una amiga.
finnish: Mari ei ole minun tyttöystäväni. Hän on vain ystävä.
english: Mary isn't my girlfriend. She's just a friend.

spanish: Quiero jugar tenis contigo algún día.
english: I want to play tennis with you someday.

spanish: Me gusta bailar.
english: I like to dance.

spanish: ¿Qué verduras te gustan?
english: What vegetables do you like?

spanish: Ayer vi una película estupenda.
english: I watched a great movie yesterday.

spanish: Yo no puedo bailar.
english: I can't dance.

spanish: Esta no es mi idea de diversión.
finnish: Tämä ei ole minun käsitykseni hauskanpidosta.
english: This is not my idea of fun.

spanish: No quiero matarte, Tom.
english: I don't want to kill you, Tom.

spanish: Tom decidió decirle la verdad a Mary.
english: Tom decided to tell Mary the truth.

spanish: Su nueva película le ameritó un Premio de la Academia.
finnish: Hänen uusi elokuvansa toi hänelle Akatemianpalkinnon.
english: His new movie earned him an Academy Award.

spanish: Tom es amigo tuyo, ¿verdad?
finnish: Tomi on sinun ystäväsi, eikö niin?
english: Tom is a friend of yours, right?

spanish: No quiero bailar.
english: I don't want to dance.

spanish: Busco a mis amigos.
english: I am looking for my friends.

spanish: Algunos de mis amigos fuman.
english: Some of my friends smoke.

spanish: La música es importante para mí.
english: Music is important to me.

spanish: Los conejos pueden nadar.
english: Rabbits can swim.

spanish: Tenemos un libro.
english: We have a book.

spanish: Las madres son todas unas verdaderas heroínas.
english: Mothers are all real heroines.

spanish: Este asunto es controvertido.
english: This is a controversial issue.

spanish: Estoy bastante seguro de que Tom no sabe nadar.
finnish: Olen aika varma siitä, että Tomi ei osaa uida.
english: I'm pretty sure Tom doesn't know how to swim.

spanish: Su verdadero nombre es Tom.
english: His real name is Tom.

spanish: Estuve toda la tarde charlando con amigos.
finnish: Vietin koko iltapäivän jutellen kavereideni kanssa.
english: I spent the whole afternoon chatting with friends.

spanish: No puedo creer que ya sea verano.
finnish: En voi uskoa, että on jo kesä.
english: I can't believe it's summer already.

spanish: Necesitamos averiguar quién condujo ese coche.
finnish: Meidän pitää selvittää se, että kuka ajoi tuota autoa.
english: We need to find out who drove that car.

spanish: Tom es amigo del hermano menor de mi esposa.
finnish: Tomi on minun vaimoni pikkuveljen ystävä.
english: Tom is a friend of my wife's younger brother.

spanish: ¿De qué parte de Australia vienes?
english: What part of Australia are you from?

spanish: Hablas francés, ¿verdad?
english: You speak French, right?

spanish: Tom y Mary son amigos de John.
finnish: Tomi ja Mari ovat Jonin ystäviä.
english: Tom and Mary are friends with John.

spanish: Tom no fue capaz de convencer a Mary de que preparase una tarta para la fiesta de cumpleaños de John.
finnish: Tomi yritti suostutella Maria leipomaan kakun Jonin syntymäpäiväjuhliin, mutta Mari ei suostunut.
english: Tom wasn't able to talk Mary into baking a cake for John's birthday party.

spanish: Tom, Mary, John y Alice son amigos. Todos se conocen desde que eran niños.
finnish: Tomi, Mari, Joni ja Alisa ovat ystäviä. He ovat tunteneet toisensa lapsuudesta saakka.
english: Tom, Mary, John and Alice are friends. They've known each other since they were children.

spanish: No tires esa revista. Todavía no la he leído.
finnish: Älä heitä pois tätä lehteä. En ole lukenut sitä vielä.
english: Don't throw away this magazine. I haven't read it yet.

spanish: Sentí ganas de bailar.
english: I felt like dancing.

spanish: Tom se enamoró de la novia de su mejor amigo.
english: Tom fell in love with his best friend's girlfriend.

spanish: Tengo muchos amigos canadienses.
english: I have many Canadian friends.

spanish: Llegué a la fiesta, pero en cuanto acabé mi comida, me fui.
finnish: Saavuin juhliin, mutta heti kun olin lopettanut syömisen, lähdin.
english: I came to the party, but as soon as I finished the meal, I left.

spanish: Encontré tu cartera en el asiento trasero de mi coche.
finnish: Mä löysin sun lompakon mun auton takapenkiltä.
english: I found your wallet on the backseat of my car.

spanish: ¿Es ésta tu cartera?
english: Is this your wallet?

spanish: ¿Te importaría pasear al perro?
english: Would you mind walking the dog?

spanish: Escucharon tiros.
english: They heard gunfire.

spanish: Mi amigo es alemán.
english: My friend is German.

spanish: Tom descubrió dos cadáveres en su sótano.
english: Tom discovered two dead bodies in his basement.

spanish: Debes cuidarte mejor.
finnish: Sinun pitää pitää parempaa huolta itsestäsi.
english: You need to take better care of yourself.

spanish: No tuvimos mucha lluvia la primavera pasada.
finnish: Viime keväänä emme saaneet paljoa sadetta.
english: We didn't get much rain last spring.

spanish: Los conejos saben nadar.
english: Rabbits can swim.

spanish: Alguien debería hacer una película de esto.
english: Somebody should make a movie out of this.

spanish: ¿Puedes bailar?
english: Can you dance?

spanish: Estoy tan contento de verte.
english: I'm so glad to see you.

spanish: Salgamos a pasear un poco.
english: Let's go out for a short walk.

spanish: Mérida es la única princesa de Disney que ni canta ni baila en su película.
finnish: Merida on ainoa Disneyn prinsessa, joka ei laula eikä tanssi elokuvassaan.
english: Merida is the only Disney princess that doesn't sing or dance in her movie.

spanish: Puasinkoi es un pequeño pueblo de Carelia en la región de Tver.
finnish: Puasinkoi on pieni, karjalainen kylä Tverin alueella.
english: Puasinkoi is a small Karelian village in the Tver region.

spanish: El pasatiempo de Tom es el golf.
english: Tom's hobby is golf.

spanish: Felices fiestas.
english: Happy holidays.

spanish: Tom es el amigo de mi hijo.
english: Tom is my son's friend.

spanish: Mi perro es verde y habla todo el rato de filosofía.
finnish: Minun koirani on vihreä ja koko ajan puhuu filosofiasta.
english: My dog is green and talks about philosophy all the time.

spanish: ¿Quieres jugar con mi tarjeta de crédito?
english: Do you want to play with my credit card?

spanish: ¿Quieres un libro?
english: Do you want the book?
